#include<vector>
#include<string>
#include<algorithm>
#include<iostream>
#include <fstream>
#include<iomanip>
#include<cmath>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cstdio>
#include<stack>
#include<cstring>
#include<map>
#include<set>
#include<queue>  
using namespace std;
#define MOD 1000000007
int main()
{
	ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);cin.tie(0);
	int a,b,c;
	int first=1;
	while(cin>>a>>b>>c)
	{
		if(first==1)
			first=0;
		else
			cout<<endl;
		if(a+b<=c)
			cout<<"PROFIT"<<endl;
		else
			cout<<"LOSS"<<endl;
	}
	//system("pause");
	return 0;
}
